countries.name: Japan
countries.description: Japan is an island country in East Asia, known for its dense cities, imperial palaces, mountainous national parks, and thousands of shrines and temples. It's a land of rich culture, history, and stunning natural beauty.

countries.name: Brazil
countries.description: Brazil is a vast South American country, famous for its vibrant carnivals, iconic Christ the Redeemer statue, and the sprawling Amazon rainforest. It boasts beautiful beaches and a lively, diverse culture.

temples.name: Angkor Wat
temples.description: Angkor Wat is a massive temple complex in Cambodia, the largest religious monument in the world. Originally constructed as a Hindu temple, it was gradually transformed into a Buddhist temple toward the end of the 12th century.

temples.name: Kinkaku-ji (Golden Pavilion)
temples.description: Kinkaku-ji, officially named Rokuon-ji, is a Zen Buddhist temple in Kyoto, Japan. Its top two floors are completely covered in gold leaf, making it one of the most iconic and picturesque sights in the country.

beaches.name: Bora Bora
beaches.description: Bora Bora is a small South Pacific island northwest of Tahiti in French Polynesia. Surrounded by a turquoise lagoon protected by a coral reef, it's renowned for its scuba diving and overwater bungalows.

beaches.name: Maldives
beaches.description: The Maldives is a tropical nation in the Indian Ocean composed of 26 ring-shaped atolls, which are made up of more than 1,000 coral islands. It's known for its beaches, blue lagoons, and extensive reefs.
